title: Noodles with shiitake mushrooms
ingredients: ['225g spaghetti or angel hair pasta', '225g shiitake mushrooms', '1 red pepper, thinly sliced', '4 tablespoons rice vinegar', '3 tablespoons soy sauce', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '1 teaspoon grated fresh ginger', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley']
